name: DualSplit
description:
Short Description :

DualSplit is a topdown platformer that we made during the Global Game Jam 2022 .

Gameplay mechanics :

In our game you control two characters in the same time with the same controls .

 Controlls :

DualSplit can be played with keyboard's arrow key or with  a PS4 controller.

How to complete a level ? 

To complete a level, the player need to ensure that both characters touch a different flag in the same time.

How to play ? 

DualSplit is a downloadable PC game so in order to play you gonna need to download it via the download link and then open the exe file inside the folder.
